description: Potential values for observations of severity.
name: SeverityObservation

text.div:
SeverityObservation

Potential values for observations of severity.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ObservationValue where concept is-a _SeverityObservation
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ObservationValue
    CodeDisplay
    _SeverityObservationSeverityObservationPotential values for observations of severity.
